channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: If We Want Healthier Americans, We Should Help Women Quit Their Jobs
item.description: The amount of time needed to produce slow food is hard to square with also holding down a full-time job out of the home.

item.title: How Jill Biden Meghan-Markled A President
item.description: Like Montecito's most controversial jam merchant, Jill Biden ruined her husband's life and has nothing to show for it.

item.title: January 6 Is Over
item.description: The political force of the 2020 election contest and the Capitol riot are spent.

item.title: Tuesday's special elections in Virginia could give early insight into governor race, 2026 midterms
item.description: Three special elections Tuesday in Virginia could prove an early bellwether in the 2025 governor's race there as well as the 2026 midterms.

item.title: Republicans look to finally push through Laken Riley bill with new GOP trifecta
item.description: Republicans are stepping on the gas and renewing bills Democrats ignored in the last Congress, the first of which being the Laken Riley Act.

item.title: The Legacy Of Jan. 6 Should Be Massive Reform Of The FBI And DOJ
item.description: Four years later, it’s clear that the federal government’s response to Jan. 6 is far worse than anything that happened that day.

item.title: Don’t Force the Ten Commandments Out of the Classroom
item.description: Contrary to the ACLU’s case against a new Louisiana law, a mountain of robust historical evidence supports the display of the Decalogue in schools.
